title: Performance Truck Signs with Electric Guard Dog for the Long Haul
text:
Electric Guard Dog
COLUMBIA, S.C. , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Electric Guard Dog announced the completion of a multi-site security deal with Performance Truck, the popular Texas full-service heavy duty truck and trailer dealership chain. Six Performance Truck locations are now protected by the market leading electric security fence company.
Performance Truck contacted the #1 Theft Deterrent Service â„¢ when they were robbed multiple times last year. General Manager Dayne Yeager explained, "We would get hit, and every time they hit us the losses were $25,000 to $30,000 . Nothing seemed to work. We had guards, but we have 5-6 acres at each location, so that's a lot of ground to cover."
Yeager first discovered Electric Guard Dog at the American Truck Dealers (ATD) Convention. "I heard great things at ATD, so I got in touch. We signed and installed our first four locations in April and we haven't had any theft there since. So now we've added two more."
Electric Guard Dog CEO Jack DeMao commented "We are very proud to be a security partner for a market leader like Performance Truck; they're great people, and a great company. We look forward to deterring theft and ensuring their safety for years to come."
DeMao continued, "We're seeing an explosion in thefts at truck sales, service and leasing companies. We saw 60% revenue growth in this market in 2014, and that trend is continuing in 2015. The ever-increasing complexity of the vehicles means the components have a higher street value, so they're a bigger target for theft. "
Electric Guard Dog , ( www.electricguarddog.com ) the #1 Theft Deterrent Service, is the market leader in electric security fences and perimeter security in the country. A Security Partner for 3,000+ commercial and industrial locations across the U.S., they protect businesses from cargo theft and copper theft, provide a safer work environment for employees, while reducing total security costs.
Performance Truck was formed in 1977 by R.C. Sweeten and Skip Martin to service and sell heavy-duty trucks and equipment. Today, we are a family of truck, trailer and related service divisions representing Mack, Kenworth, Volvo and premium trailer manufacturers. We are committed to growth and innovation and are managed by experienced professionals who are supported by a loyal workforce. We take pride in choosing our products and designing our services to meet the needs of customers who demand high quality and superb performance.
For more information, contact publicist Kathleen Hannon at 704-425-8106 or via email at press@electricguarddog.com .
